021import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
026import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
027import net.tnemc.core.channel.SyncHandler;
028import net.tnemc.core.config.DataConfig;
029import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
030import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
031import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
032import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
033import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
034import net.tnemc.core.transaction.history.AwayHistory;
035import net.tnemc.core.utils.MISCUtils;
036import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
037import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
038import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreExecution;
039import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreTime;
040import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDPair;
041import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
042import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.HandlerResponse;
043
044import java.util.Date;
045import java.util.Optional;
046import java.util.UUID;
047
048/**
049 * Represents an event where a player is joining.
050 *
051 * @author creatorfromhell
052 * @since 0.1.2
053 */
054public class PlayerJoinHandler {
055
056  /**
057   * Used to handle a PlayerJoinEvent using the specified {@link PlayerProvider} class.
058   *
059   * @param provider The {@link PlayerProvider} associated with the platform event.
060   *
061   * @return True if the event should be cancelled, otherwise false.
062   */
063  public HandlerResponse handle(final PlayerProvider provider, final String serverIP, final int serverPort) {
064
065    final HandlerResponse response = new HandlerResponse("", false);
066
067    PluginCore.log().debug("Player Join ID: " + provider.identifier());
068
069    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(provider.identifier());
070
071    boolean firstJoin = false;
072    AccountAPIResponse apiResponse = null;
073
074    PluginCore.log().debug("Join Account Check: " + account.isPresent());
075
076    //Our account doesn't exist, so now we need to continue from here
077    if(account.isEmpty()) {
078      firstJoin = true;
079
080      apiResponse = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(provider.identifier().toString(),
081                                                          provider.getName());
082
083      PluginCore.log().debug("API Join Check. Account Exists: " + apiResponse.getAccount().isPresent());
084      if(apiResponse.getAccount().isEmpty()) {
085        response.setResponse(response.getResponse());
086        response.setCancelled(true);
087        return response;
088      } else {
089        if(!apiResponse.getResponse().success() && apiResponse.getAccount().isPresent()) {
090          firstJoin = false;
091        }
092      }
093    }
094
095    PluginCore.log().debug("First Join: " + firstJoin);
096
097    final Optional<Account> acc = (apiResponse == null)? account :
098                                  apiResponse.getAccount();
099
100    final UUID id = provider.identifier();
101    if(acc.isPresent()) {
102
103      if(!acc.get().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(provider.getName())) {
104        acc.get().setName(provider.getName());
105
106        TNECore.eco().account().uuidProvider().store(new UUIDPair(provider.identifier(), provider.getName()));
107      }
108
109      if(firstJoin || acc.get().getCreationDate() == ((PlayerAccount)acc.get()).getLastOnline()) {
110
111        final String region = TNECore.eco().region().getMode().region(provider);
112        for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
113
114          if(currency.type().supportsItems() && MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Server.ImportItems", true)) {
115
116            TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().add(id);
117
118            for(final HoldingsEntry entry : acc.get().getHoldings(region, currency.getUid())) {
119
120              acc.get().setHoldings(entry, entry.getHandler());
121            }
122
123            TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().remove(id);
124            continue;
125          }
126
127          PluginCore.log().debug("Setting Balance to Starting Holdings Currency: " + currency.getIdentifier());
128
129          if(firstJoin) {
130            acc.get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region,
131                                                    currency.getUid(),
132                                                    currency.getStartingHoldings(),
133                                                    EconomyManager.NORMAL
134            ));
135          }
136        }
137      } else {
138        TNECore.eco().account().getLoading().add(id);
139
140        final String region = TNECore.eco().region().getMode().region(provider);
141        for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().getCurrencies(region)) {
142
143          if(currency instanceof final ItemCurrency itemCurrency) {
144
145            if(!acc.get().getWallet().contains(region, currency.getUid())) {
146
147              if(itemCurrency.isImportItem()) {
148
149                TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().add(id);
150
151                for(final HoldingsEntry entry : acc.get().getHoldings(region, currency.getUid())) {
152
153                  acc.get().setHoldings(entry, entry.getHandler());
154                }
155
156                TNECore.eco().account().getImporting().remove(id);
157              } else {
158                acc.get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region,
159                                                        currency.getUid(),
160                                                        currency.getStartingHoldings(),
161                                                        EconomyManager.NORMAL
162                ));
163              }
164            } else {
165
166              for(final HoldingsEntry entry : acc.get().getHoldings(region, currency.getUid())) {
167
168                acc.get().setHoldings(entry, entry.getHandler());
169              }
170            }
171          }
172        }
173      }
174      TNECore.eco().account().getLoading().remove(id);
175
176      PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->{
177
178        final Optional<AwayHistory> away = acc.get().away(((PlayerAccount)acc.get()).getUUID());
179        if(away.isPresent()) {
180          provider.message(new MessageData("Messages.Transaction.AwayJoin"));
181        }
182
183      }, new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
184
185      if(provider.hasPermission("tne.admin.update")) {
186        if(MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Update.Notify") && TNECore.instance().update() != null) {
187
188          if(TNECore.instance().update().needsUpdate()) {
189            provider.message(new MessageData("<red>[TNE] Update Available! Latest: <white>" + TNECore.instance().update().getBuild()));
190          }
191
192          if(TNECore.instance().update().isEarlyBuild()) {
193            provider.message(new MessageData("<gold>[TNE] Thank You for testing this pre-release version!"));
194          }
195        }
196
197
198        if(TNECore.eco().transaction().isTrack()) {
199          //TODO: Any warnings? Balance jumps?
200        }
201      }
202
203      //If this is the first player online, sync balances.
204      if(PluginCore.server().onlinePlayers() == 1) {
205        //check if server own wants db reloaded
206        if(DataConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Data.Sync.Reload.Enabled", false)) {
207
208          if(MISCUtils.isTimeDifferenceGreaterOrEqual(new Date(TNECore.eco().getReloadTime()), DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Reload.Time", 120))) {
209
210            TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().clear();
211            TransactionManager.receipts().getReceipts().clear();
212
213            TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(Account.class, "");
214            TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(Receipt.class, "");
215
216            TNECore.eco().setReloadTime(new Date().getTime());
217          }
218        } else {
219          SyncHandler.send(acc.get().getIdentifier().toString(), acc.get().getName(), serverIP, serverPort);
220        }
221      }
222    }
223    return response;
224  }
225}
